headline: DeSantis signs into law tax holidays for gas, schools, hurricanes,
author: Jim Turner
sentences: Along with holding traditional tax-holiday periods before the school year and as hurricane season starts, the package will eliminate taxes during all or part of the 2022-2023 fiscal year on items including baby clothes, diapers, childrens books, Energy Star appliances, impact-resistant doors and windows, new mobile homes and admissions to Formula One Grand Prix races and the Daytona 500.
TALLAHASSEE  Sales-tax holidays? on such things as school clothes, hurricane supplies and tools and a suspension of the state gas tax in October topped a package signed into law Friday by Gov.
The measure (HB 7071), passed by the Legislature in March, will reduce state and local revenues by $804.3 million during the upcoming fiscal year, according to a House staff analysis.
The total will increase to about $1.1 billion when future impacts are factored in.
